parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> DLC</value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all DLCs objects the unit is currently using. For example if a unit is inside a vehicle from DLC, it will return the code of that DLC. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getPersonUsedDLCs]] unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Number|Numbers]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_objects = [[getPersonUsedDLCs]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>  [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> <template><title>warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value>This command does not work on a dedicated server.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>MP behaviour</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
